title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Scott takes drastic action to expose Mitchell to Cleo
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

It’s been a tough few months for Mitchell Deveraux (Imran Adams) in Hollyoaks — what with him confused over his feelings for Scott Drinkwell (Ross Adams) — but his troubles are far from over as, following another confrontation between the pair, Scott resorts to drastic measures in order to get Mitchell to expose the truth to Cleo McQueen (Nadine Mulkerrin).

Following the passionate kiss he shared with Mitchell, Scott was determined to get to the bottom of what was going on with the young man, and thus gave him an ultimatum — telling him that he needs to choose between him and Cleo. Scott was left heart-broken when the young man chose Cleo, and then proceeded to ask her to move in with him.

In the coming episodes, this love triangle seemingly persists, as Mitchell asks Cleo to move in once more so that he can prove how much he loves her.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Not too pleased with the way things are playing out, Scott later confronts Mitchell and berates him for not being truthful about what transpired to Cleo.

Mitchell’s angry at Scott’s words, and thus calls him deluded, before going one step further and telling him that he regrets ever kissing him.

As a result, Scott is left heartbroken once more and proceeds to get drunk. Later, he drunkenly posts a note under Cleo’s door — a note which claims that Mitchell is a liar.

On Scott’s actions, actor Imran Adams said: ‘Cleo finds it and she wants to know who sent it and what’s going on. Mitchell is definitely not happy.’

‘Scott is hurt because he is falling for Mitchell. Before they were in this situation, they were becoming very close friends and that then led to something else but the love that they have for each other is making them make decisions that they wouldn’t normally make and are quite out of character for them.’

Will Cleo discover the truth?

What’s more, will Scott come to regret his actions once he’s sobered up?

Either way, Mitchell’s going to have some explaining to do!
